inclusion.criterion: chronic or recurrent right lower abdominal quadrant pain for more than three months
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: suffered from chronic or recurrent right lower abdominal quadrant pain for more than three months

exclusion.criterion: surgery (with the exception of diagnostic laparoscopies or a laparoscopic sterilization)
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: She is a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia

exclusion.criterion: specific gastro-intestinal entities (such as inflammatory bowel disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abdominal pain, distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, abscess or gangrene. Candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy.
